title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry pancetta. Beat eggs with cheese. Combine all with pasta and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka
summary: A flavorful Indian dish with marinated chicken cooked to perfection.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices, yogurt, and lemon. Grill or bake until cooked through.
